name: Tracked
description:
the goal of the game is to kill enemy trackers, bots, and sentries.

you can go invisible by holding shift. While you are invisible, you will receive a movement speed bonus, if you are near an enemy bot or sentry you will still be seen. If you are not seen, you get an additional speed bonus. You can detect invisible enemy units by using dust (press e).

Bots - Standard enemies that will follow you around and attack you.

Sentries - invisible stationary enemy eyes that can see you while you are invisible.

Trackers - Invisible enemies that will start tracking you. When you are tracked, you will be seen no matter what. Once you are tracked, they will run away again after being visible for short period of time. While you are tracked, you will be able to see what direction the tracker is in. Killing the tracker tracking you will end the track.
